instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3662 - Sometimes no Trackpad and Keyboard after sleep
threads.message:
Hello,

I have that board on which we've replaced the whole topcase (kb + tp) but same behavior.
It will sometimes works fine after sleep but sometimes you just get no TP+KB. External USB mouse and keyboard will work fine however.
I can see the caps lock light on when this is happening.

Any idea which area I should look at first?
Thank you.

threads.title: 820-3662 - Sometimes no Trackpad and Keyboard after sleep
threads.message: When it is not working is the TP+KB recognized as a USB device?

threads.title: 820-3662 - Sometimes no Trackpad and Keyboard after sleep
threads.message:
Hello Duke,

It seems yes as it still shows up in the system report...

threads.title: 820-3662 - Sometimes no Trackpad and Keyboard after sleep
threads.message: Probably on the TP interface. Inspect connector and traces for corrosion/damage, maybe bad U5701. This is probably going to suck :(
